properties.name: kind
properties.desc: Represent the type of button. It's an enumeration and the values can be either 'normal', 'split', 'dropdown' or 'kabab'.

properties.name: behavior
properties.desc: Equivalent to the HTML button's type. It's an enum and the possible values are 'button', 'submit' or 'reset'.

properties.name: buttonType (button-type)
properties.desc: The UI type of button. It's an enum and the possible values are 'primary', 'primaryWarn', 'secondary', 'secondaryWarn' and 'tertiary'.

properties.name: defaultDropdownHorizontalAlignment
properties.desc: The default horizontal alignment of dropdown. It can either 'left' or 'right'

events.name: button-click
events.desc: The click event. Can be used for programatic subscription.

events.name: option-click
events.desc: This event is fired whenever an option is clicked in dropdown/split/kebab.
